title: Is there any mage in league right now that could alone power up galio?

replies.body: What exactly do you mean? He activates from any magic. We know for a fact that Lux makes him come alive, it was in their short story
Well he needs a lot of magic to get going.
Ehhh, i think just any persisting magic would do.  Lux wasn’t even trying and he woke up.

> [{quoted}](name=WOOOOOOOOHOOOOOO,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iHurLRtH,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-14T16:25:09.288+0000)
>
> Ehhh, i think just any persisting magic would do.  Lux wasn’t even trying and he woke up.

I think he was "aware" when she's around, but I don't think he fully got up until she shot him with magic, I think, out of anger.

Lux was able to do it herself in a story,so I'm pretty sure that most mages in the game are able to do it.

Also you forgot {{champion:134}} a champ who is all about having huge amounts of magic power.
Oh cool i missed that story ^.^, you are right i forgot her :P

You forgot {{champion:13}}

Also, I doubt that Kennen could. He's hardly a mage, aside from the spirit magic and innate yordle magic. Shen uses Spirit Magic too.
I don’t think you specifically have to be a mage.
Well, if we consider "Mage in League" any kind of champion in the category of Mage, then {{champion:68}} is one of the fews that would NOT power up Galio, at all.

I'd put {{champion:127}} in here. She's been alive for a LONG time and fairly certain she's gathered a lot of power in that time. There's also speculation that she has her hands on a World Rune and that's basically a magic nuke
I dont think {{champion:136}} counts as magic does it? Its probably like innate star-dragon abilities or something.
Morgana, syndra, karma, Janna, mordekaiser maybe and others. It really depends on how galio functions and interacts with all the various types of magic.

If {{champion:99}} can bring {{champion:3}} too life then i would believe any number of Champs that can use a normal amount of magic would bring galio too life. So mages from {{champion:90}}  to {{champion:8}} . Also maybe hextech if the brackern hearts count as magic so that means {{champion:164}} {{champion:126}}. Demigods use magic too so {{champion:427}} and {{champion:516}} as well as the others.
